director.name: 米哈尔·布拉斯科 Michal Blaško

introduction: Will the father-son relationship make the trip into the wild more enjoyable? Are thechildren really cruel or just playing innocent games? What will the teacher do wheneverything is already synchronized? Three stories set on a mysterious island.The animated film by Marta Prokopová and Michal Blaško sheds memories of childhoodand adolescence into narcotic images and suggestive sounds.
